statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT full_name, email, country FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, language FROM user_profiles WHERE subscription_type='Premium' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE language='English' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_users FROM user_profiles WHERE subscription_type='Premium';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles WHERE country='Canada' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, birthdate FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at > '2020-01-01';
SELECT username, email, birthdate FROM users JOIN preferences ON users.user_id = preferences.user_id WHERE preferences.theme = 'Dark';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, email, birthdate FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email, gender FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, name, last_login FROM user_profile ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, age FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT up.name, ua.activity_name, ua.activity_date FROM user_profile up JOIN user_activity ua ON up.id = ua.user_id WHERE up.age > 30 ORDER BY ua.activity_date ASC;

SELECT up.name, up.email, up.gender, up.last_login, up.age, ua.activity_name FROM user_profile up LEFT JOIN user_activity ua ON up.id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT up.name, up.email, CASE WHEN up.gender='Male' THEN 'M' ELSE 'F' END AS short_gender, COALESCE(up.age, 0) AS formatted_age FROM user_profile up ORDER BY up.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, date_of_birth, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT user_id, lang_preference, theme_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE lang_preference = 'en';
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND date_of_birth <= '2000-12-31';
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, p.lang_preference FROM user_profiles u INNER JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.notification_preference = true;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, COUNT(f.follower_id) AS follower_count FROM user_profiles u LEFT JOIN user_followers f ON u.user_id = f.followed_user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;

SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, a.activity_type, a.activity_timestamp FROM user_profiles u INNER JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY a.activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, bio FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_friends FROM user_friends WHERE is_mutual = true GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, media_title FROM user_media WHERE media_type = 'Movie' ORDER BY media_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_ratings.rating_id) AS total_ratings FROM users LEFT JOIN user_ratings ON users.user_id = user_ratings.user_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_ratings > 3 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT u.username, up.category, up.preference_value FROM users u INNER JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%' AND up.category = 'Sports';

SELECT u.username, COUNT(uf.friendship_id) AS total_friends FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_friends uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id1 OR u.user_id = uf.user_id2 GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY total_friends DESC LIMIT 5;
